002.name: OldMan
002.text: Hey, kid! While you're out would you do me a favor?

004.name: OldMan
004.text: No, it'll be fun! The Frim have been acting up again, I just need an up-and-coming adventurer like yourself to go show 'em what's what!

005.name: Player
005.text: Well why didn't you say so! Let me at'm, I won't show any mercy, you'll see!
